scripts.build: echo '🔨 Building project...' && tsc -b && echo '📦 Running Vite build...' && vite build && echo '✅ Build complete!'
scripts.preview: echo '👀 Starting preview server...' && vite preview
scripts.lint: echo '🔍 Running ESLint...' && eslint . && echo '✨ Linting complete!'
scripts.test: echo '🧪 Running tests...' && vitest run && echo '✅ Tests passed!'
scripts.test:coverage: echo '📊 Running tests with coverage...' && vitest run --coverage && echo '📈 Coverage report complete!'
scripts.deploy: echo '🚀 Starting deployment process...' && yarn test && echo '🔨 Building for deployment...' && yarn build && echo '� Backing up dist folder...' && cp -r dist /tmp/zkm-dist-backup && echo '�📝 Switching to production branch...' && git checkout production && echo '🗑️ Cleaning production branch...' && find . -maxdepth 1 -not -name '.git' -not -name '.' -not -name '..' -exec rm -rf {} + && echo '📦 Copying build files...' && cp -r /tmp/zkm-dist-backup/* . && git add . && git commit -m 'Update production build for deployment' && echo '⬆️ Pushing to production...' && git push origin production && echo '🧹 Cleaning up backup...' && rm -rf /tmp/zkm-dist-backup && echo '🔄 Returning to master...' && git checkout master && echo '🎉 Deployment complete!'
scripts.deploy:check: echo '🔍 Pre-deployment check...' && yarn test && echo '🔨 Test build...' && yarn build && echo '✅ Ready for deployment!'
scripts.deploy:prod: echo '🏭 To deploy to production, create a PR from master to production branch on GitHub'
scripts.docker:dev: echo '🐳 Starting Docker development environment...' && docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml up
scripts.docker:prod: echo '🐳 Starting Docker production environment...' && docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml up web-prod
